popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on melee combat
A mastery path focused on siphoning power from your enemies

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Flee
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds.  You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

data.name: Blood Offering
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will regain 30 Soul Essence every second.  If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Stand, Coward!
data.note:
Requires 20 Soul Essence
Only usable on Dead Players
data.description: Life is restored to a dead ally, and 20% of their health is recovered in the hopes they will prove less worthless to you in the future.

data.name: Soul Infusion
data.description: Your target is gradually infused with 1520 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Terrifying Vision
data.description: Your enemy is distracted by malevolent spirits, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage against you for 15 seconds.  You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Patch Wounds
data.note:
Requires 25 Soul Essence
Target must be Hexed or Ailing
data.description: You patch an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 25 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description:
You deal 25% more damage, but your healing output is reduced by 20%.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Terrifying Aura
data.description:
All enemies within 30 feet hate you less and deal only 50% damage to you for 5 seconds. For the next 5 seconds, you will cause 25% less hate in all enemy monsters. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken.
If you attack anyone that you've Detaunted, the effect will immediately fade from them.

data.name: Khaine's Blessing
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 1200 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.

data.name: Unyielding Tormentor
data.note:
Requires 45 Soul Essence
Requires Dual Wield or Shield
data.description: You free yourself from all roots and snares. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Essence Shatter
data.description: Removes the cooldown of Essence Lash. Essence Lash no longer gives Soul Essence per enemy hit, instead it builds 30 Soul Essence if it hits any target. Action Point cost of Essence Lash reduced by 10. Range reduced by 10 feet.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Khaine's Imbuement
data.description: Any time you hit an enemy with a direct damaging ability, there is a 33% chance that they will suffer an additional 370 damage over 5 seconds. Whenever this tactic is triggered, your chance to critically hit with attacks is increased by 5% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Consume Enchantment
data.note:
Builds 30 Soul Essence
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals 127 damage.

data.name: Sacrificial Renewal
data.description: Whenever you critically heal an ally with a direct healing ability, you increase the power of your heals by 15% for 5 seconds, but you also take 10% more damage from all sources.

data.name: Transfusion
data.description: Increases the healing of Soul Infusion by 25%.

data.name: Bound by Blood
data.description: Increase your Critical Healing by 25%. The Soul Essence cost of Restore Essence is reduced by 10.

data.name: Life's End
data.description: For 10 seconds, you allow your group mates within 100 feet (instead of yourself) to feast on the life essence of your victims, healing everyone for 100% of the melee damage you deal.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Vivification
data.description:
Covenant give group members within 100 ft of you a 20% chance on hit to increase the power of heals used on them by 25% for 5 seconds.
Does not stack with Blessing of Chaos.

data.name: Khaine's Withdrawal
data.description: Removes all Ailments, Curses, and Hexes from your group.

data.name: Potent Covenants
data.description: Increases the chance for your Covenants to trigger by an additional 15%.

data.name: Bleed Out
data.description: Increases Lacerate and Fell Sacrifice's durations by an additional 6 seconds. Increases the damage of Sanguinary Extension by 25%.

data.name: Universal Confusion
data.description: Raw power erupts in a 25 feet area around you, inflicting 1200 damage and Staggering all enemies around you for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Fueled Actions
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Soul Essence.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Transferred Focus
data.description: Consume Essence and Transfer Essence are now undefendable.

data.name: Uncaring Dismissal
data.description: A great energy washes over all targets in front of you, blowing back all enemy players within 30 feet and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Restores 1800 health to all group members within 100 feet and increases your outgoing healing by 35% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Restore Essence
data.description: Dark forces restore 309 health to an ally immediately, and another 370 over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Khaine's Invigoration
data.description:
A quick heal that restores 781 health.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Covenant of Tenacity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time
data.description: You make a pact with Khaine. Any time a groupmate within 100 feet hits an enemy, they have a 20% chance to regain 250 health over 5 seconds while reducing the amount of their armor being bypassed by 5%.

data.name: Khaine's Embrace
data.description: All of your groupmates within 100 feet of you regain 477 health.

data.name: Soul Shielding
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet becomes surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 1162 damage for each person.

data.name: Khaine's Bounty
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 712 damage. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Soul Energy
data.description: Over the next 10 seconds, your direct heals will heal their target for an additional 225 health. This effect will not trigger more than once every 1.5 seconds.

data.name: Efficient Patching
data.description: Patch Wounds will now remove one Ailment or Hex for the entire group.

data.name: Khaine's Vigor
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gradually regains 783 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Restored Motivation
data.description: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 Action Points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Khaine's Refreshment
data.description: You throw yourself open to Khaine's influence as power rushes through you for up to 3 seconds.  Each second, all allies within 25 feet of you will regain 246 health, and you will lose 20 Soul Essence.  This effect will end if you lose your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Thousand and One Dark Blessings
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by 1320, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by 25, and all Resists by 504 for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Cleave Soul
data.description: A potent attack which deals 164 damage to your enemy. If you are behind your target or when Drowning in Blood, you deal an additional 138 damage.

data.name: Fist of Khaine
data.description: You call forth the wrath of Khaine, dealing 127 Spirit damage to your target.

data.name: Lacerate
data.description: A gory strike that Curses your enemy, dealing 101 damage initially and another 150 damage over 10 seconds and reducing their Toughness by 120.

data.name: Flay
data.description: You flay your target for 239 damage and snaring them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 3 seconds. If they are Cursed, the snare duration is increased to 6 seconds.

data.name: Essence Lash
data.description: You lash out at all opponents in front of you up to 50 feet away, dealing 138 damage and regaining 15 Soul Essence for each enemy hit.

data.name: Covenant of Celerity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gain a 20% chance to Cripple anyone that they damage, dealing 168 Spirit damage and reducing the victim's run speed by 20% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Drowning in Blood
data.note:
Requires 20 Soul Essence per second
Requires Dual Wield
data.description: Increases your critical damage by 25% for 5 seconds or until you run out of Soul Essence. While Drowning in Blood you cannot gain Soul Essence.

data.name: Fell Sacrifice
data.description: Curses all targets within 25 feet of you for 444 over 9 seconds. Increases your chance to critically hit affected enemies with Essence Lash by 10%.

data.name: Murderous Intent
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but your healing output is reduced by 20%.

data.name: Sanguinary Extension
data.description: You strike your enemy for 164 damage. If you strike your target from the rear, you reduce their movement speed by 60% for 3 seconds. If you are currently Drowning in Blood, you curse your enemy dealing 225 damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Bloodthirst
data.description: Covenant Of Celerity will now deal 286 Spirit damage.

data.name: Wracking Agony
data.note:
Requires 40 Soul Essence
Target must be below 50% health
Requires Dual Wield
data.description: Deals 502 damage and to a wounded foe. If you are Drowning in Blood, you will almost always deal critical damage and won't require any Soul Essence. If this ability lands a killing blow on your enemy, you gain 50% increased movement speed for 5 seconds.

data.name: Curse of Khaine
data.description: Lacerate will also curse the target and make healing on them 50% less effective. Sanguinary Extension now deals an additional 201 damage when the damage over time effect ends.

data.name: Serrated Blade
data.description: You drive your blade into your target, dealing 276 damage and reducing their armor by 1600 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Vision of Torment
data.description: Victim is overcome with seemingly endless visions of their own grisly death. So real are the visions, that the victim suffers 2394 damage over 7 seconds and will lose 600 Morale for every second of agony.

data.name: Consume Essence
data.description: You strike your enemy dealing 202 damage to them. Using the force of Khaine, you heal your friendly target for 251 health plus 75% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Consume Strength
data.description: A Crippling attack which deals 164 damage and reduces your enemy's Strength by 80 for 20 seconds. Your defensive target's Strength is increased by 80.

data.name: Covenant of Vitality
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you damages an enemy, they have a 20% chance to deal an additional 187 Spirit damage to their victim, and heal themselves for 150% of the damage dealt. This effect will not trigger more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Rend Soul
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, shredding their soul energy and twisting it to your own purposes. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing 109 Spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Warding Strike
data.description:
A cunning strike which deals 202 damage to your enemy and reduces their chance to parry by 10% for 15 seconds.

Additionally, when wearing a shield your chance to block will be increased by 10% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Force
data.description: You slash your enemy dealing 239 damage to them. Through Khaine, you heal your group mates within 100 feet for 389 health plus 100% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Transfer Essence
data.note:
Requires Shield or Chalice
Builds 30 Soul Essence
data.description: An unholy attack which deals 164 damage to your target and spills out a portion of their soul, healing group mates within 100 feet for 148 health plus 75% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Consume Thought
data.description: An overwhelming attack which deals 239 damage to your enemy and silences them for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Horrifying Offering
data.description: Consume Strength will now also cause the victim to lose 50 Action Points.

data.name: Pillage Essence
data.description: A strike into your target's soul which deals 239 damage and interrupting any ability that they are building up. If an ability was interrupted, it will cause them to lose 50 Action Points and you will gain 50 Soul Essence.

data.name: Gift of Khaine
data.description: Khaine’s Force now additionally heals all group members within 100 feet for 231 health over 3 seconds.

data.name: Devour Essence
data.description: You envelop yourself or an ally in a devouring aura, up to 4 enemies within 20 feet take 69 damage each second for 5 seconds. Your ally is healed 150% of all the damage dealt.

data.name: Empowered Transfer
data.description: Increases the base heal of Transfer Essence, Consume Essence and Khaine’s Force by 50%. Rend Soul will now heal your allied target for 186 health every tick.

data.name: Khaine's Encouragement
data.description: You strike your enemy for 164 damage and surround your ally by a barrier, absorbing up to 1387 damage over 10 seconds. This attack buffs your next casted healing ability by 35% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Chant of Pain
data.description: You call upon the Word of Pain, dealing 300 damage every second to all enemies in a 25 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Reveling in their agony, your group members within 100 feet are healed for all damage inflicted by the Word of Pain.
